sources.title: Personal Effects | Full Movie | Drama Romance | Ashton Kutcher | Michelle Pfeiffer
sources.description:
*Personal Effects* - Walter Blount (Ashton Kutcher) is a 24-year-old former wrestling champion. One year ago, his twin sister, Annie, was raped, stabbed and gruesomely murdered. Her death left behind Beth, Annieâ€™s 5-year-old daughter; her mother, Gloria, who attends a support group for murder victimsâ€™ families, and Walter, who is unable to cope with the loss or move on.
2009.  Stars: Michelle Pfeiffer, Ashton Kutcher, Kathy Bates

metadata.Plot: Walter, 24, is a wrestler, competing for a spot on the national team when he learns of his sister's brutal death. He comes home to help his mother; he works out, takes a dead-end job, and goes to the trial of the accused murderer. He becomes friends with Linda, her husband murdered; she's raising a teen son, Clay, who's deaf. Walter gets Clay into wrestling. He accompanies Linda to events at a center where she works. He sees her at the courthouse. They wait for verdicts. Walter's mother takes her daughter's things to a rummage sale. Clay has his father's pistol. How will grief express itself?
metadata.Actors: Michelle Pfeiffer, Ashton Kutcher, Kathy Bates
